mapper.select: SELECT pkm_pack.id AS bagid,pokemon.id AS id,pokemon.`name` AS name,pokemon.img AS img,pokemon.type AS type,pokemon.ability AS ability,pokemon.others AS others,pkm_pack.meetTime AS meetTime,pkm_pack.LV AS LV FROM pokemon,pkm_pack WHERE pokemon.id=pkm_pack.pokemon_id AND pkm_pack.user_id=#{id} AND (pokemon.name LIKE #{name} or type like #{name})
